name: Bistecca alla Fiorentina
recipeIngredient: 1 pound T-Bone Steak, about 1 1/12 inches thick.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix together rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Coat steak with herb mix. Brush steak with olive oil.

Preheat a grill to high heat. Place steak on the grill and cook until charred on the outside, about 2 minutes per side. Turn heat down to medium and flip steak back to first side. Continue to cook for 4 minutes.
Take steak off grill and let rest for 10 minutes. Cut fillet and strip into slices, and serve.
